lines.text: Greetings to you, Earthlings, I am Princess Dragon Mom. I have taken over this planet, now I own the Earth and you'll be my slaves for all eternity.
There are other weapons I haven't given you as yet. For success it's essential you have thunderball fists.
I can have such a thing?
No matter how potent your weapons are, you'll be defeated because Infra-Man is invincible against them!
...It would be foolish to fight Princess Dragon Mom with military power; that would lead to defeat. Therefore, another way must be found, and it's up to us to find that way.
Rayma, now you are filled with power and energy! For you, nothing will be an impossibility! Your senses are intensified, so you can even see and hear through walls!
